author: Joyce Rhim
description: Would recommend to those who can sleep shamelessly in the lying down position. Sleeping in sitting position is not really an option here. May be uncomfortable for tall people.

comfort.details: A pillow would've been nice but could definitely be worse

location.details: Isolated and mostly quiet if you come at a good time

other.details: Ligh is really bright, it can be colr without a blanket or jacket
